p: The acute toxicity study of each tested sample was undertaken in accordance with the guidelines of the Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development (OECD). Albino mice (n=6) were administered orally with 800 mg/kg of each extract and observed for any changes in behavior and mortality at intervals of 0, 5, 10, 15, 20, and 24 h. Mice were examined for an additional 6 days for any signs of late morbidity and mortality.
